line: He noteth how through silent heaven the stars soft gliding fare,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: Arcturus, the wet Hyades, and either Northern Bear,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: And through and through he searcheth out Orion girt with gold.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: So when he sees how everything a peaceful sky foretold,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: He bloweth clear from off the poop, and we our campment shift,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: And now, the stars all put to flight, Aurora's blushes grow,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: When we behold dim fells afar and long lands lying low,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: --E'en Italy. Achates first cries out on Italy;

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: To Italy our joyous folk glad salutation cry.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: Anchises then a mighty bowl crowned with a garland fair,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: And filled it with unwatered wine and called the Gods to hear,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: High standing on the lofty deck:

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: 'O Gods that rule the earth and sea, and all the tides of storm,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: Make our way easy with the wind, breathe on us kindly breath!'

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: Then riseth up the longed-for breeze, the haven openeth              530

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: As nigh we draw, and on the cliff a fane of Pallas shows:

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: Therewith our fellow-folk furl sail and shoreward turn the prows.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: Bow-wise the bight is hollowed out by eastward-setting flood,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: But over-foamed by salt-sea spray thrust out its twin horns stood,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: But I beheld upon the grass four horses, snowy white,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: Grazing the meadows far and wide, first omen of my sight.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: And tamed beneath the yoke will bear the bit and bridle's strain,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: And veil our brows before the Gods with cloth of Phrygian dye;

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: And that chief charge of Helenus we do all rightfully,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

line: Unto the wind our sail-yard horns we fall to turn about,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: And leave the houses of the Greeks, and nursing fields of doubt.     550

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: Nor worser than his word they do, and first the roaring beaks

line: Doth Palinurus leftward wrest; then all the sea-host seeks

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: With sail and oar the waters wild upon the left that lie:

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: Upheaved upon the tossing whirl we fare unto the sky,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: Locked from the wind the haven is, itself an ample bay;              570

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: But hard at hand mid ruin and fear doth Ætna thunder loud;

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: And whiles it blasteth forth on air a black and dreadful cloud,

line: This world of mountain presseth down, as told it is in tale,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

line: In thicket close we wear the night amidst these marvels dread,

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

line: Then strew me on the flood and sink my body in the sea!

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: To die by hands of very men shall be a joy to me.'

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.
line: As there he lay upon his back; I saw the threshold swim

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

Poem Title: ÆNEAS HANGETH ARMOUR HERE FROM CONQUERING DANAANS WON.

line: So wandering all about, at last I see unto the shore
